packages.name: Sonos Advanced Controller
packages.description: Advanced app and driver for Sonos speakers. Allows non-interrupting TTS, grouping control, and more.

packages.name: Third Reality Smart Blind Drivers
packages.description: Improved driver for Third Reality Smart Blinds. Adds 'verfication' checks to ensure blinds always move to 'desired' position, eliminating issues where blinds might otherwise fail to respond to the first ZigBee command sent.
